name: Mercy Health Physicians North Specialty Care LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mercy Health Physicians North Specialty Care LLC is a Allergy & Immunology provider based in Toledo, OH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $13.0M in Medicaid payments across 779K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $13.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
